domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Vertical
domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Interests and Hobbies Category
domain.description: A grouping of interests and hobbies entities, like Novelty Food or Destinations

text:
@Newsweek Panicky responses aside:

1) This is interim guidance. Not much is known about COVID-19 yet compared to other viruses. Policies will change as more is learned.

2) The decision can be appealed.

3) This is a recruitment policy. It doesn't affect existing personnel.
